attributes.action: No to NHS paying for Breast Implant Debacle
attributes.additional_details: No to Taxpayer picking up the bill for removing the faulty breast implants. The private companies who provided the surgery and supplied the unsafe implants should ultimately foot the bill. It is outrageous that the hard up NHS have to pay.  These women chose to have their implants and should contact the private companies concerned, not expect the NHS to foot the bill.
